3: The retriever has analyzed the skin tissues of the Forsaken and isolated two components.
There's the Punishing Virus... and the antigen...
From the residues of the two elements in him, he must have been injected with both the virus and the antigen during his time here for over three months.
They've been performing human trials on them... until they're all broken like this.
Does that mean... the Golden Vortex is effective against the Punishing Virus?!
You've broken the rules... The Queen is not happy...
